Reviews.Title: Very reasonable
Reviews.Author: Jest54
Reviews.Content: First I'm not a techie, don't use tvs that much, don't even use a DVD player, just needed a basic tv.  I don't have cable, use Roku to watch programs.  This tv was for the exercise room.  The tv arrived, I assembled and placed  it in 5 minutes, took another 30 seconds to hook up Roku and was watching.  Simple, easy, my kind of electronic.  My old tv had a volume limit that often couldn't be heard over active exercise equipment.  The sound on this tv is a huge improvement; at half volume it can easily be heard over the equipment.  It was a good price, got it within 2 days.  I'm totally happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!!!
Reviews.Author: Charlotte A. Pittman
Reviews.Content: LOVE my new tv.  It is the first flat screen  I have owned. Easy to hook up. I strongly recomend  this product.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Penny Lasky
Reviews.Content: Loved the TV as it was perfect for our guest room and the price was incredible. Loved the quick shipping and I didn't have to haul it home.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Joan R. Shea
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the money! Was easy to install and has a great picture!Would reccommend this tv to any one!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: James R. Griffin Sr.
Reviews.Content: This TV was easy to set up and joins more Toshiba tvs in my house. The picture is top notch. I have always had good luck with Toshiba flat screens.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Picture
Reviews.Author: Brittney
Reviews.Content: Love this TV, it is the perfect size. It is so sleek and flat, it was easy to hang and the picture is clear and beautiful. Great product and I am very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Frustrated
Reviews.Author: Sara W. Ashcraft
Reviews.Content: I have had the TV two weeks. I have no problems with the TV its self.  I had no trouble connecting it to my cable. It has a good picture. My problem is that I have been unable to connect my DVD player. The TV included no directions at all.  The web site is no help at all. I called the number provided and after a very long wait, I got someone who did not speak English. I searched the internet for some one who could help with the problem to no avail.  I tried to download a users guide but their directions did not match what my TV had on it. There was also a charge to download some of the users guides. I will not buy that brand again.

Reviews.Title: I's so glad I waited to purchase this 50 inch Sony HDTV.
Reviews.Author: Eugene M. Davis
Reviews.Content: I wanted to purchase this TV when it first came out but the price was too high, when it came down a little I then purchase it. Once I hocked the HDMI Cable from my Sony Laptop to the Toshiba 50 inch HDTV and turn it on...I was blown away with the color, HD quality and more. Since I have cancelled my Cable TV, I stream all my favorite TV Shows & Movies on my Laptop via my old HDTV. By replacing my old HDTV, with Sony 50 HDTV...I became a permanent couch potato and love it.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture
Reviews.Author: Nicole McQueen
Reviews.Content: This TV is wonderful fo the price.  Crystal clear picture and easy to install.  I would recommend to anyone. Enjoyable!

Reviews.Title: very good product for the cost
Reviews.Author: Judy McCabe
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my purchase. The only thing I wish I had was an owners guide. I had some problems with setting up certain features.

Reviews.Title: Super picture and really good price
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: Very good picture; bright; clear; SHARP.  I use it for a computer monitor and works very well.  I purchased on sale so the price was really excellent (my opinion).  Any way you look at it, it was cheaper than buying a large, straight monitor for the computer and this way you get a bonus by having a TV to boot.  Works well.....Recommend.

Reviews.Title: what a beautiful screen
Reviews.Author: kristine arruda
Reviews.Content: I've never noticed the screen of TV's and HD, sorry folks,  i thought you were only kidding us. this one however showed me the difference HD makes, it is so clear and sharp!  I hope the clarity won't go away when I get hooked up with my service provider. I'm glad I picked Toshiba!

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 32 inch Model # L1400U1
Reviews.Content: This tv works great and price was right. Had to send first one back because back light was bad so it kept going black (screen). I had them send a new one for free with overnight shipping.Glad i gave them a chance to make it right.Everything is fine and we like our new TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: John R. Tucker
Reviews.Content: Bought this for our guest house. The picture is absolutely stunning and the price...... extremely affordable !!!!!!I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Price unbeatable quality good enough
Reviews.Author: David Sega
Reviews.Content: Muy buen TV llego en excelente estado , si bien la calidad de la imagen no es la mejor en movimiento (60hz) es good enough ! This tv is gorgeous very thin and beatiful black finished , it do not have a owners guide but its too basic you don't really need one guys. For the price you don't get anything better on 40 inches

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Mtlndgma
Reviews.Content: I'm very disappointed in the picture quality. I expected better from Toshiba. Some channels aren't too bad, but others are really bad. I just signed up for cable tv again and there is no problem on other tvs.

Reviews.Title: Get ready to search for instructions!
Reviews.Author: Martha Wellers "Marta"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for one of the bedrooms.  But, get ready to read all your instructions online because there's nothing telling you why you don't get a picture or how to change the picture format.  This is terrible.  The picture is ok and the price is good for a 32" TV.  I still don't have it set up completely because I got tired of returning to blogs to find out how to change things.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier
Reviews.Author: Paige DeLuna
Reviews.Content: I'll start off by saying the the TV is beautiful, great size, great sound quality, I have no complaints especially for the price.It shipped very fast, it got a little delayed because I ordered right before the weekend, but it arrived in perfect condition. It was easy to set up, only needed a screwdriver, minimal help is needed, you can set it all up by yourself. I would, and have recommended this TV to people, it is a great TV for a great price.

Reviews.Title: best tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Barrieclark "BWC"
Reviews.Content: this is the upgraded version of the toshiba tv i love it rounded corner's easy assembly great picture i purchased this for my bathroom wall it's excellent slim size does not get in my way it's a great tv  im very happy to have been able to purchase this .. it's perfect in every way i would recommend this tv ten time's more

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 32L1400U 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV EIEIO
Reviews.Author: David August "Internet gadfly"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for a senior friend, to replace her old-school cathode-ray box. She lives in a remote area that cannot get cable, nor even digitized broadcast, and the cost of satellite service was out of the question. So all this TV will be used for is to play DVDs.I set it up for her myself, which was not too difficult. I might add here, assembly of the included stand requires a Phillips-head screwdriver. The whole, from opening the box to putting the TV in place, took maybe 10 minutes,Let me add: Beneath all the shiny black plastic, the stand includes a steel plate and steel bracket. It's plenty sturdy, so her worries of her housecats knocking it over were groundless.Setting up the TV initially was more of a nuisance. You must use the Arrow keys (on the included remote control) to make your choices, then press Enter for each. But you have to be careful, because the Arrow keys do not respond nearly as quickly as the Enter key. So you have to be...very...patient, and watch the onscreen menu closely, else you'll have to start all over (I did, twice).The picture and audio both looked good when it was set up and running. This is supposedly one of those 'backlit' TVs, which adds to the picture, but since I viewed it next to a window during full daylight I can say nothing of that feature. Either way, both color and brightness looked excellent, as they should with a DVD the only source.So far, so good, and the price was definitely attractive too. I first deducted a star for the item's name. It says, as you'll see above, "720p." That means 720 pixels per square inch, not 1040 pixels, which is "high definition." Yet it also says "HDTV," meaning "high-definition television." Well, it can't be both, can it? And it's not. This is not a true high-definition television set.But it's still a great set and I believe my senior friend will be excited with her introduction to wide-screen home entertainment. For the price, it'd be a five-star TV, if only they'd drop that misleading and inaccurate "HD" from the name.But there's this: I chose this set for my friend based on an earlier review which seemed to suggest the remote control was appropriate for elders of failing eyesight and fluttering fingertips. I am happy to say, this set's remote control is well-suited for persons of years, being of largish size, with big, clearly distinct and clearly labeled buttons. If you were looking for a set for use by a senior, why, this is the one you want. So I've added the final star back in, for its EZ-2-Use remote control.

ProductInfo.Features:
Refresh Rate: 60Hz (Native)
Backlight: LED (Edge-lit)
Smart Functionality: No
Dimensions (W x H x D):  TV without stand: 44.2'' x 26.1" x 2.9", TV with stand: 44.2'' x 27.6'' x 8.5''
Inputs: 2 HDMI, 1 USB Video, 1 Composite, 1 Component
Accessories Included: Standard remote
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba 50L1400U 50-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED TV
